channel.title: Installing vBulletin
channel.description: I'm trying to install vBulletin on my domain. I edited the config.php, uploading to my public_html, and then tried to go to www.mydomain.com/install/install.php and it didn't work, and when I go to my regular site, without the install.php at the end, it says Index of /, then has the upload folder down below. Any help?

item.title: Installing vBulletin
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:19, topic:350675”][quote author=WowILikeToCode link=topic=447032.msg3283819#msg3283819 date=1280069976]
if you use nulled vB you are a douche. You may aswell just juse a free forum software such as SMF that is easier to install and use.
[/quote]

Also it’s open source and IMHO it’s more appealing.[/quote]

Yea… vBulletin is only good if you are covering it with ads from google and making so much money from it due to its high costs

Read full topic

item.title: Installing vBulletin
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:13, topic:350675”][quote author=CookieScape link=topic=447032.msg3281001#msg3281001 date=1279870547]
I’m trying to install vBulletin on my domain. I edited the config.php, uploading to my public_html, and then tried to go to www.mydomain.com/install/install.php and it didn’t work, and when I go to my regular site, without the install.php at the end, it says Index of /, then has the upload folder down below. Any help?
[/quote]Tell me you’re not using a shitty webhost to host vbulleting… such as 000webhost…[/quote]

I’m not a dumbass I have a .org domain with hostgator. Cheap, decent hosting until we have money to buy a dedi or VPS.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you know most form software’s, then you should know it has a directory that has the installer in it. you need to find it and use it like so; http://www.youdomain.com/install/installer.php, it won’t be exactly like that but it you should find the install script in their some were.
